statements: SELECT * FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee_benefits WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_benefits WHERE eligibility_criteria LIKE '%medical%';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, enrollment_status FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, eligibility_criteria FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee_benefits WHERE eligibility_criteria LIKE '%health%';
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_id, is_eligible FROM employee_benefits WHERE is_eligible = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM enrollment_status ORDER BY enroll_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(enroll_date) AS latest_enrollment_date FROM enrollment_status GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM enrollment_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE is_eligible = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, effective_date FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, is_eligible, effective_date FROM employee_benefits WHERE is_eligible = TRUE AND effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS num_enrollments FROM employee_benefits LEFT JOIN enrollment_status ON employee_benefits.employee_id = enrollment_status.employee_id GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, enroll_date, status FROM enrollment_status WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY enroll_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE benefit_eligibility_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND benefit_eligibility_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' OR department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, department, benefit_name, cost FROM employees JOIN enrollment ON employees.employee_id = enrollment.employee_id JOIN benefits ON enrollment.benefit_id = benefits.benefit_id WHERE enrollment.status = 'enrolled';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_name, department, status FROM employees JOIN enrollment ON employees.employee_id = enrollment.employee_id WHERE enrollment.status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Benefit WHERE coverage_limit > 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, b.benefit_name FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EnrollmentStatus es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id INNER JOIN Benefit b ON es.benefit_id = b.benefit_id WHERE es.status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT e.employee_name, ec.criteria_name, ec.min_years_of_service FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EligibilityCriteria ec ON e.department = 'Sales' AND e.employee_id = ec.criteria_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, es.enrollment_date, es.status FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EnrollmentStatus es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id WHERE es.enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_benefits WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM enrollment_status ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT full_name, benefit_type, coverage_amount FROM benefit_enrollment WHERE coverage_amount >= 500
SELECT benefit_type, sum(coverage_amount) as total_coverage FROM benefit_enrollment GROUP BY benefit_type
SELECT full_name, position FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT * FROM benefit_criteria WHERE min_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, position, start_date FROM employee_benefits WHERE benefit_eligibility = TRUE;
SELECT enrollment_id, employee_id, enrollment_status FROM enrollment_status ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT enrollment_id, benefit_type, coverage_amount FROM benefit_enrollment WHERE coverage_amount < 1000;
